description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); rear roof extension, installation of two roof lights to front roof slope and rear external flue
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:-   Proposed Plans Rec. 1/9/2022 - Location & Block Plan drawing no.22.172.32OS, Proposed Site Plan drawing no.22.172.320, Proposed - Ground Floor Plans drawing no.22.172.321, Proposed - First Floor Plans drawing no.22.172.322, Proposed - Second Floor Plans drawing no.22.172.323, Proposed - Roof Floor Plans drawing no.22.172.324, Proposed - Section A-A drawing no.22.172.325, Proposed - Section B-B drawing no.22.172.326, Proposed - Rear Elevation drawing no.22.172.327, Proposed - Side Elevation drawing no.22.172.328, Proposed - Adj. Side Elevation drawing no.22.172.329 and Proposed - Front Elevation drawing no.22.172.330
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, London Plan policy D3 and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per the approved plans referenced in condition 2. For the avoidance of doubt, this shall also be glass.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
